articles.author: Brett Tingley
articles.title: BepiColombo probe captures haunting Mercury image on 5th of 6 gravity assist flybys (photo) - Space.com
articles.description: The European-Japanese BepiColombo probe made a close flyby of Mercury on Dec. 1, 2024 and captured an image of the planet.
articles.content:
The BepiColombo Mercury probe flew close to our solar system's innermost planet this week, capturing another haunting image as it zoomed by.
On Sunday (Dec. 1), BepiColombo made its fifth of six fly… [+2363 chars]

articles.author: Clea Caulcutt, Giorgio Leali
articles.title: The French prime minister will likely fall this week. So then what? - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Only a miracle can save Barnier. There doesn’t seem to be one on the horizon.
articles.content:
Yes, but its not that simple. 
The French National Assembly is divided into three political blocs: Macrons centrists, the far-right National Rally, and the left-wing coalition. The three groups are … [+1059 chars]
